item.title: Purple Shampoo: The Science Behind Blonde Hair Maintenance
item.description: Purple shampoo is a game-changer for blonde hair, but how does it work? This blog post explores the science behind purple shampoo, its color-correcting properties, and the best tips for using it effectively to maintain beautiful, bright blonde locks.
